verses.verse: Now [this is] the enumeration <S%H4557><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households,] the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and their officers <S%H7860><s%> who served <S%H8334><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the affairs <S%H1697><s%> of the divisions <S%H4256><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> in and went <S%H3318><s%> out month <S%H2320><s%> by month <S%H2320><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year, <S%H8141><s%> each <S%H259><s%> division <S%H4256><s%> [numbering] 24000.

Jashobeam <S%H3434><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdiel <S%H2068><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> division <S%H4256><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

[He was] from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez, <S%H6557><s%> [and was] chief <S%H7218><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

Dodai <S%H1737><s%> the Ahohite <S%H266><s%> and his division <S%H4256><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the division <S%H4256><s%> for the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> [being] the chief <S%H5057><s%> officer; <S%H5057><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The third <S%H7992><s%> commander <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> [as] chief; <S%H7218><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

This <S%H1931><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> [was] the mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H1368><s%> of the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> and had charge <S%H5921><s%> of thirty; <S%H7970><s%> and over his division <S%H4256><s%> was Ammizabad <S%H5990><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

The fourth <S%H7243><s%> for the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him; and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The fifth <S%H2549><s%> for the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] the commander <S%H8269><s%> Shamhuth <S%H8049><s%> the Izrahite; <S%H3155><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> for the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite; <S%H8621><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The seventh <S%H7637><s%> for the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite <S%H6397><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The eighth <S%H8066><s%> for the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%> of the Zerahites; <S%H2227><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The ninth <S%H8671><s%> for the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anathothite <S%H6069><s%> of the Benjamites; <S%H1145><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The tenth <S%H6224><s%> for the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%> of the Zerahites; <S%H2227><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

The twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> [was] Heldai <S%H2469><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%> of Othniel; <S%H6274><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> [were] 24000.

Now in charge <S%H5921><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> chief <S%H5057><s%> officer <S%H5057><s%> for the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> was Eliezer <S%H461><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri; <S%H2147><s%> for the Simeonites, <S%H8099><s%> Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maacah; <S%H4601><s%>
for Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kemuel; <S%H7055><s%> for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Zadok; <S%H6659><s%>
for Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Elihu, <S%H453><s%> [one] of David's brothers; <S%H251><s%> for Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Omri <S%H6018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael; <S%H4317><s%>
for Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Ishmaiah <S%H3460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Obadiah; <S%H5662><s%> for Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Jeremoth <S%H3406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azriel; <S%H5837><s%>

for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaziah; <S%H5812><s%> for the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah; <S%H6305><s%>

for the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> Iddo <S%H3035><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah; <S%H2148><s%> for Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Jaasiel <S%H3300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abner; <S%H74><s%>
for Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Azarel <S%H5832><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham. <S%H3395><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

But David <S%H1732><s%> did not count <S%H5375><s%> <S%H4557><s%> those twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of age <S%H1121><s%> and under, <S%H4295><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> He would multiply <S%H7235><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> had begun <S%H2490><s%> to count <S%H4487><s%> [them,] but did not finish; <S%H3615><s%> and because of this, <S%H2088><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the number <S%H4557><s%> was not included <S%H5927><s%> in the account <S%H1697><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

Now Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel <S%H5717><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the king's storehouses. <S%H214><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the storehouses <S%H214><s%> in the country, <S%H7704><s%> in the cities, <S%H5892><s%> in the villages, <S%H3723><s%> and in the towers. <S%H4026><s%>
And Ezri <S%H5836><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chelub <S%H3620><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the agricultural <S%H7704><s%> workers <S%H4399><s%> who tilled <S%H5656><s%> the soil. <S%H127><s%>

And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the Ramathite <S%H7435><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the vineyards; <S%H3754><s%> and Zabdi <S%H2067><s%> the Shiphmite <S%H8225><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the produce of the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> [stored] in the wine <S%H3196><s%> cellars. <S%H214><s%>

And Baal-hanan the Gederite <S%H1451><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the olive <S%H2132><s%> and sycamore <S%H8256><s%> trees <S%H8256><s%> in the Shephelah; <S%H8219><s%> and Joash <S%H3135><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the stores <S%H214><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And Shitrai <S%H7861><s%> the Sharonite <S%H8290><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the cattle <S%H1241><s%> which were grazing <S%H7462><s%> in Sharon; <S%H8289><s%> and Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adlai <S%H5724><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the cattle <S%H1241><s%> in the valleys. <S%H6010><s%>

And Obil <S%H179><s%> the Ishmaelite <S%H3459><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the camels; <S%H1581><s%> and Jehdeiah <S%H3165><s%> the Meronothite <S%H4824><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the donkeys. <S%H860><s%>

And Jaziz <S%H3151><s%> the Hagrite <S%H1905><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the flocks. <S%H6629><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were overseers <S%H8269><s%> of the property <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belonged to King <S%H4428><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

Also Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> David's uncle, <S%H1730><s%> [was] a counselor, <S%H3289><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding, <S%H995><s%> and a scribe; <S%H9373><s%> and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hachmoni <S%H2453><s%> tutored <S%H5973><s%> the king's sons. <S%H1121><s%>
And Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> was counselor <S%H3289><s%> to the king; <S%H4428><s%> and Hushai <S%H2365><s%> the Archite <S%H757><s%> was the king's friend. <S%H7453><s%>

And Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> and Abiathar <S%H54><s%> succeeded <S%H310><s%> Ahithophel; <S%H302><s%> and Joab <S%H3097><s%> was the commander <S%H8269><s%> of the king's army. <S%H6635><s%>
